author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Third Point Takes Share Stake In Wynn Resorts, Microsoft
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Third Point LLC:
* TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 1.5 MILLION SHARES IN WYNN RESORTS - SEC FILING
* TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 550,000 SHARES IN MICROSOFT - SEC FILING
* DISSOLVES STAKE IN HONEYWELL - SEC FILING
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: ( bit.ly/2IjmYBd ) Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2BtZhBz )
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
